Now I'm going to have to pay double to get the more expensive ones that I like these were complete 100% out of pocket waste. I am vaccinated but I can feel my breath pouring out of the sides and under the chin area of this so I know it is not keeping other people safe from my germs.I went and wasted 10 more dollars on cloth masks to go over this to keep it sealed around my face but as luck has it, I got really bad cloth masks.When I open the container I wasn't paying attention and the cloth masks I got to go over the top don't have a wire for the nose so they don't keep these masks down either. I can still feel my breath going out through the sides and down at my neck.These disposable masks do have a wire but it doesn't help and in a bunch of The masks I checked in The wire only covers like half of one part there's like wire remnants in it or something. Worst quality I ever got I feel like I was robbed. Literally feel like you took the money right out of my hands against my will because you gave me unusable garbage.

I can comfortably wear this mask for twelve hours straight with no issues.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Not the same as before
content: I have ordered these 4 times since spring- specifically selecting “reorder” each time so I was getting the same. They were really great quality in spring, so when the price was good in June I reordered.  I understand supply and demand,  so I wasn’t shocked to an increase when I ordered for the 3rd time as the start of school neared, but thought the 200+% increase was a bit excessive. The packaging was different but the product seemed similar. I ordered again this week to replenish my dwindling stock. It was up another $1.00, the packaging was, again, different, and this time the product is very sub-par. It looks similar, but it’s about half the thickness, the ear loops are thinner and feel less sturdy and the nose piece is not as solid. The original quality which kept me reordering is definitely gone, and add to that the price increase- I will not be repurchasing.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask

content: I love the appearance of these masks and they are very well made! I cant tell you how many times the bands have snapped when I have used to traditional and cheaper white masks.

title: 5 masks broke in a span of 5 hours
content: These masks are JUNK!! I had 5 break on me in a span of 8 hours! I have to wear a mask at work and would like to not have to change it out every couple of HOURS!! Do not buy!! They are not made durable!

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Latina mom approved
content: Mom wanted new facemasks, but got some colored ones at her work that smelled like chemicals. These, however, did not smell at all, except for that "fresh off the press" factory smell, but that is about it.If you like to wear black all the time and need facemasks that are worth the money, these are the ones. 10/10, only issue is that they don't come in a 1000 piece bulk pack. Still, 2x 50 piece resealable bags are great for the average consumer.As an IT specialist visiting many homes and offices, although I need to change masks very often to avoid cross-contamination, I've bought these many times over just because the quality is consistent, even after four months of continuous buying. Great product. And yes, even if you're vaccinated like I am, please wear a mask :)

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask

First the elastic breaks easily, and even tho I have a big head I have only had the elastic break of masks, different brands, on 3 occasions since COVID started. product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Comfortable, nice fit
content: I teach in an all day preschool and have to wear masks all day. I used to wear just cloth masks, but some of them are too thick for me to communicate clearly with the children and my coworkers. I like the weight of these. I feel protected (the children 2 & up also wear masks). I like the black better than the plain blue doctors’ style. These have a flat, flexible nose wire to fit then close to my face. I wear glasses so that’s important to prevent the glasses from fogging up.I am very sensitive to textures and smells. These masks do not have an odor that I’ve noticed.I have a relatively small face. My husband has an average-large face. These fit bit of us well.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: VERY STRONG CHEMICAL SMELL!
content: The ones I purchased had a very, very strong chemical smell! It was overpowering!  There is no way I can use these, so I will be returning them. I do see where some reviews mention a strong chemical smell and others don't. I also noticed that pictures posted for these particular masks show totally different packaging than the ones I received. I'm thinking the packages of masks differ from customer to customer, depending on what's available at the time of sale.  I did buy another box of black masks from another seller that did not have any smell whatsoever, so I know it can be done. I wish I would have bought more of those, because, unfortunately, those are no longer available.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Poor Quality: Ear loops break immediately!
content: I am a high school teacher and I bought these because students often ask me for a mask in my classroom to replace an uncomfortable, ill-fitting, or broken mask (or if they forgot one). I had bought black disposable masks before that worked fine, and they thought black ones were cooler than the standard blue ones for some reason. This time, these masks seem so much more cheaply made and I feel they’re a complete waste of my money. Multiple times, I’ve had a student go to put one on and the ear strap immediately broke. I don’t know if I just got a bad batch or what. Very disappointed!

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask

content: Disposable mask that isn’t an eyesore. I was purchasing cute linen and silk masks, but my face was having severe chin break outs. I switched to these and my skin has cleared back up. I do not have acne prone skin. I can also make these fit my children, the ear loops are very soft and stretchy, so I make little loops to make them smaller- kid size. Great price, too!

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Terrible. Do not buy
content: I should have known better based on the price.  These were terrible.  I couldn’t get past the packaging. I looks like someone grabbed a stack of masks, shoved them into a plastic bag and taped it shut. It wasn’t even sealed shut.  Parts of the bag were open near the top where the tape didn’t cover and there was a small hole on one side.  Which means they were exposed.  I returned.  I’ll spend a little more and get good quality.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Contains Unkown Chemicals
content: These were purchased a couple weeks ago, I bought them for my 11yr old to wear to school. She wanted a different color then they hand out at school, so we went with the black as black goes with everything. She told me first day that she could smell what kind of smells like cough medicine coming from them. I reassured her that it was probably the type of material and I wore one for a day and all seemed well just a little funky. 2 weeks later my daughter now has red itchy and irritated eyes. At first I contacted her dr, we treated her for pink eye, no change, then was told it must be an allergy in the air from wind and weather, tried allergy antihistamine eye drops only to discover and realize that she does not have symptoms the days that I keep her home from school because they are so bad. By then end of the day she has not worn them, her eyes are almost normal, I send her back to school and she returns home with red irritated eyes. She says she can’t even smell them anymore. She’s gotten used to it. Geez I feel like a horrible mother at this point. Long story short, don’t buy these unless you’re ok with chemical irritants. I’m so thankful e finally figured this whole thing out, switched to different masks the last couple of days and we are back in business.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Don't buy these masks!
content: I bought these masks on Amazon because the ones I usually buy are out of stock.Do not buy these masks!!!* Some, the ear string are broken out of the bag.* Some, the ear string breaks while you are wearing the mask.* Some, the wire that keeps the mask at your nose pops throught the mask -- right near your eye!!!! Dangerous!!!While most of the masks are perfectly wearable, the need to run back to the car for a new one or the risk of poking an eye out... no, no, no.I bought several packets to get me through the winter. Wish I could return them.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Stinky!
content: The chemical smell was overwhelming when I opened the package. I still had some of the ones I usually buy so I aired these out for a couple days before using them. They're fine now but I'm still a bit worried about what chemicals were on there. I can feel some kind of coating on them. They fit pretty good and the elastic is comfortable. The nose strap (is that what it's called?) keeps them in place. I only bought these because my usual brand was out of stock. I'll use these but I won't buy them again.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: 95% garbage.
content: These are extremely poor quality. The top left strap rips off the mask on 75% of them. The straps are that horrible flat thin material that hurts the back of your ears. The metal strip is basically a spring steel, meaning you can’t form it to your nose to make a seal. (Yay foggy glasses every single time….)These are garbage. I hate when people sell actual garbage. And I really hate when I pay real money for garbage.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: They’re masks, but they seem to fit loosely and it was confusing which way they went.
content: I’m immunocompromised so I’ve been wearing masks while flying commercial(like a 10 hour flight where between the airport and the actual flight I wore a different but similar style mask for over 12 hours, doctor’s and all medical appointments since way before COVID was a thing(around 5-7 years prior to the pandemic) so I’m pretty used to wearing masks. Did my immunocompromised status I can’t wear cloth masks because you have no way of knowing if they’re really blocking anything so my hematologist told me I had to wear disposable masks(which I pretty much already knew.) I know these work well since they caused me to have an elevated oral temperature of 102.5 when it was taken at my rheumatologist’s office, which quickly lowered to normal after they had me go mask free for several minutes, so I know they’re doing their job. These are lightweight and it’s easy to forget you’re wearing them. My 18 year old son went for bloodwork and forgot he had it on until I told him he didn’t need to wear it in my car unless he thought I had COVID. I’ve also forgot I’ve had it on so they are definitely comfortable. Well as comfortable as a mask can be and let’s face it, that’s not very comfortable. They appear to work although I find them rather loose. Also when I first got them it was slightly confusing which way they went. Normally masks have a white side and a blue side so it’s easy to know which way they go but these are the same exact color on both sides so it was slightly confusing at first to figure out which way they were supposed to go(due to COVID and masks being in short supply when it first started  I’ve been wearing a different style of disposable mask than these ‘traditional style’ masks.) I finally figured it out to get the tightest fit possible even though they still feel too loose but that also could be because of the type of disposable masks I had been using as they fit a lot tighter than this style. I do notice my glasses fogging a lot more(not really often but often enough to be slightly annoying) no matter how tight I make the bridge of the nose which is annoying(and I rarely have that problem since I’ve become an expert at tightening them well at the bridge since, as I said before, I’ve had to wear masks for 5-7 years before COVID made everyone wear a masks.) All in all they’re a good mask and, except for what I’ve mentioned, they’re great and is definitely recommend them.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Not very easy to breathe during workouts
content: I bought these masks for the first time because my usual ones were out of stock. They are a little tighter on the ear loops, which I like. It fits better than my usual ones. But the material is the same on both sides, which is fine, but I wish the material that touches my skin was softer. The biggest issue I have with these masks is that it's harder to breathe during workouts. My usual masks are thicker but a lot more breathable. I guess these would be ok if I didn't wear it during exercise, but I'm going back to my old masks as soon as they come back in stock.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Ear Loops Separating from Mask
content: 5 of the last 10 masks that I have used from this order, the ear loops broke when I went  to put them on. So frustrating.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Been buying for over a year this last batch was awful
content: I don’t know if they change manufacturers or material they use to make them. But I have literally bought hundreds of these because my mask mandate at work has never dropped and I work long hours and wear at least two a shift. This last batch of 100 that I ordered is itchy, rough material, and the ear loops are a lot shorter and hurt within a half hour. Going to buy locally, disappointed

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Not the same batch
content: Kind of disappointed with the mask quality. I ordered a pack of 100 in 2021 and the masks were good quality, see picture mask on the right. I received the second package two days ago and I immediately noticed something was wrong. The package was different than the one received in the first order. And look mask on the left, the mask is so thin it lets the light through. Returning this product immediately.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Breathable and goes with everything
content: I go for the black masks because they go well with everything. Its pretty comfortable, and I haven't rain into any issues with durability either. To be honest though, the actual filtration of the mask is not the best (based on deep inhalation/exhalation test). I'd say it's probably more fit for the people who wear a mask because it's required or "just because." If you are looking to make a fashion statement or you're really hoping to protect yourself from oral secretions and illness, this might not be your best bet.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Not the same thing
content: As others, I ordered again. They are not the same.Not in a box. Not the same fabric. Not the same metal strip on the nose.It still has that same paper stamp for our future supreme overlords though.....OK enough to keep but if "the apocalypse" gets renewed for a season three ....I will look elsewhere.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: The BEST
content: Pros: These mask are far my favorite. I have a larger face and the mask is stretchable and comfortable. The straps does not hurt around my ears and I can wear the mask all day with great comfort. It's super light weight and I'm able to breath.Cons: Some of the straps on the masks were broken. For my batch, I found 5 mask with broken straps but it wasn't a big deal for me. Also, there's a smell to the mask. The smell isn't bad or toxic, but if you're sensitive to smell, you may want to pass on buying these mask.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Ugh:
content: So I’m an RN and have been wearing masks for 12+ hour shifts for over a year and a half now. Couldn’t deal with the blue hospital masks my job provides because I have very sensitive skin. Those blue ones make my face itch like crazy and even causes it to become raw and painful. I started buying my own and have been a black mask faithful because I just could not tolerate it anymore. I was in tears by the end of my shifts. This is the first pack of black masks I’ve gotten in over a year that I didn’t love. I hate leaving negative reviews but these ones smell weird, are really stiff, and make my face itch like crazy. All reasons I don’t wear the blue ones my job provides. I don’t know…just a tad disappointed. Otherwise I really do appreciate the speedy shipping. Just not crazy about these masks. :(

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Cheap masks
content: Out of all the previous masks I’ve purchased, these have definitely been the worst. I wore these masks to an event just a few days ago and while at the event both mine and my friends masks broke, therefore leaving us without a mask for the rest of the night. Also I’m used to the white lining inside of the mask helping you differentiate between what is the front and back of the mask, however these masks don’t have that so if you takeoff your mask and put it down, you’re more likely to forget which side was the front and which side was the back. I probably wouldn’t buy these masks again. I normally use these for work or when I go to the gym or go out but the quality of these masks really aren’t that great and I wish I would’ve spent the extra couple bucks on pink masks that I had previously bought instead of these cheap black ones.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Masks Have Awful Smell
content: The masks have a really bad smell that doesn't want to go away, even with airing the masks. I have no idea if the masks fit because I can't stand the smell long enough to put them on my face. I wish I had read the other reviews about the smell, but I just looked at how many stars the product had. Tossing them. Bad purchase. Lesson learned.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Don't fit very well
content: These masks don't feel very well. Compared to surgical masks (the blue kind), these do not contour well around the bridge of the nose, leaving a lot of empty space on both sides of the nose.  This seems to be due to the quality of the metal insert that shapes around the nose bridge.  In addition to the decrease protection that this results in, this also causes greater fogging of my eyeglasses, as extra breathing moisture comes up from the top of the mask.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Not good
content: I ordered these masks in the summer and they weren’t bad. Moldable nose piece, medium thick, solid ear bands. I needed more and went back to my previous orders to make sure I got the same ones. Using the exact same link as before I reordered and received a totally different, and much shoddier product. They were not in the same packaging, didn’t have the same ‘brand’, and of course they are terrible fit and quality.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Slight smell
content: As some of the other reviews have noted, they had a slight plastic smell. I figured out that the plastic bag they were shipped in was the cause of the smell so I took the masks out of the plastic and left them on my counter for a few days and the smell went away. Other than the smell, they worked great.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: This mask product lacked merit.
content: Listen I opened the masks & found that in the midst of the masks a few of them only had one string. The left ear string was missing so I threw them away. I didn’t bother to go through the remaining unopened ones but because a few was missing in the first pile I imagined it is the same with the latter pile. It was very disheartening & since I chose to keep the whole packet in spite  of the few masks that only have one ear string I will just suffer the loss & order another brand next time. Too much of a hassle to repackage & return.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Good quality
content: Good quality overall. My only complaint is I ordered three and only received one. They canceled the other two pack and I’m not sure why. It just said undeliverable. They plan on crediting me but have no explanation as to why. Maybe there is a one package limit? Easy to breathe in and even helps mask odors from changing patients who have soiled linen  or strong urine, or cholesystostomy bags. There are strong odors from these things at times and the mask really does help from having to breathe it in. Overall I’m happy with this product. Had I gotten all three bags I would have given 5 stars.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Poor quality, flimsy and not lined.
content: I have ordered a lot of masks that look just like these ones, but these do not have a somewhat clear coating on them so the second they get sweat on them they are soaked. They’re much flimsier than ones I’ve bought previously. I usually use these for the gym and they don’t hold up, so I’m forced to order another pack elsewhere and have 100 I can’t use.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: All Are Damaged !!Not Buying Again!!
content: Horrible buy not sure if its just me but every mask i have tried using is damaged i barely stretch the loop to go behind the ear to put on and it literally falls off the masks ive gone through 32 masks out of the 100 so far and have got only 2 to not bust on me bought for my kids to use at school Definitely Not Buying Again!!! Thought one side would be white as well that goes towards face but both sides have the same material which is what goes on the outside 😤

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: These smell god awful
content: As a family of 4, we have gone through a lot of masks in the last 18 months. These are nearly identical to the ones we have ordered repeatedly (those were out of stock), but they smell absolutely awful. I dumped the package into a tote and left them outside for an afternoon to air out and it didn’t help.Pass on these—who knows what the smell is and whether it’ll harm your lungs breathing it in all day.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Really, really great!
content: Where I live (Oregon), masks are still mandatory everywhere. So, if you have to wear a mask, you might as well look classy, right? With these masks, you can achieve that. They are super soft, comfortable, and—best of all—allow you to breathe normally (unlike some cloth masks I’ve tried). And if you’re a fashionista, you know that black goes with everything. 😊

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: The worst product I've ever bought.
content: Honestly, I thought the first couple were part of a series of unfortunate events. But 90% of these masks broke the moment I went to put on my ear.What a huge waste of money. Literally, right now I had 3 in a row break. Ugh!!!! So frustrating. This happened all throughout my recent trip and even had to rig some because we didn't know we had to being 5 backups on every outing. Do no buy.🚫🚫🚫

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Scratchy & make your face hot more than others I’ve used
content: While using my first one yesterday on the subway, I noticed my face was extremely warm. More than normal and usual from using other surgical black style masks. I switched it out for the other brand in my bag and sure enough, my face was much more comfortable. For some reason this scratchy mask breathes very warm. And as mentioned, the material is very stiff and scratchy Vs others I’ve used. Returning.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Love these!!!
content: Wow these masks are actually super comfortable!!! I have struggled and bought so many different ones trying to find ones that don’t bother me.  I cant feel them around my ears at all! Definitely very breathable also!! Def buy these!! You can’t beat the price for this good of quality!!

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Good buy but nothing special just another mask
content: These are good, and I recommend buying them if you can get a good price on them like I did think I paid about six or seven bucks for 50 of them. They’re pretty similar to the blue masks that look very similar I mean there’s nothing really all that special about them but at the same time there’s nothing bad about them either really. I usually use n95 masks when I go anywhere sketchy because they’re so easy to find now but there are many occasions where I  just slap one of these on and is actually easier and makes more sense, not to mention cheaper so they still have their purpose.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Possibly a BAD batch???
content: Masks are light weight and the elastic for the ears is fairly comfortable; however, they fall apart quickly. Definitely not made to be used all day. I bought these to wear to work and change them daily. I have a petite face and I find myself going through 4-5 masks a day because of them not holding together on the sides (see picture). Unfortunately, I will not be buying these again.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Good in a pinch
content: This is maybe the third set I've bought. I've never experienced any that smell, so I'm not sure if the other reviewers received something different or what. These are comfortable, I have never had one break on me, they don't hurt my ears and work well with my glasses (two pairs, one that sits directly on the nose and one with a nose piece.) I'm giving them four stars because the description says they are 3 ply and they are kind of thin. Not thin enough that I will stop wearing them, but thin enough that I doubt that claim.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Easy for travel, stores easily
content: These have been my go to mask when ordering different selections during the pandemic. They are definitely a must have, easy to travel with and easy to store and keep on deck for long term and short term use. I hope that they keep making the black color, this makes it easy to coordinate clothing and uniforms.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Great in everything but consistency
content: The mask material is light and comfortable and everything you'd expect from this style of disposable mask. They come as two closed packs of 50 masks in a larger bag so it's nice to be able to keep half sealed until you're ready to use themThe issue comes from the elastic bands. Of one bag of 50, 33 bands snapped off from very minimal pulling and 4 had no bands at all. The 2nd pack of 50 are all fine and every one passed a pull test. It seems that I got a bad batch so it's recommended you double check the bands before putting them on. Despite getting 63 usable masks instead of 100, it's still a decent price so I'm not worried about it but buyer bewareTL;DR masks are ok but 35% of the elastic bands broke or were missing

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Prime Day deal
content: Got these for $7.20 on Prime Day, so a great deal. Almost gone and none have broken, and the nose bridge is easy to adjust so it doesn't fog up for a 10 year old with glasses, an adult man with beard and glasses, and even for me as an Asian woman with a low/no nose bridge who sometimes wears glasses.They did smell strongly when I opened them so I spread out one 50 pack to air out and did the same with the other 50 pack with a dryer sheet, and the ones I left alone ended up preferable and fine. I have never smelled anything while wearing one, even outside in 90 degree humid weather, so it seems it was just the initial packaging.I wear one every day at work as required and it is comfortable and breathable. They are light but I don't find them any thinner than any other disposable masks.Have to rebuy masks since school is starting back up and my daughter will be wearing at least one every day, but now that the regular price is 3x what I paid I will probably buy something cheaper.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Do Not Buy!
content: I bought these masks for the price point, 100 pcs for $9.99. Pretty good!  Well, I received them yesterday and wow am I disappointed. They are not at all what I was expecting. They are so thin and flimsy! Please be aware, THEY ARE NOT MEDICAL GRADE. I will be returning because they will not be protecting anyone from anything.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Not for someone with Narrow Face
content: Fit was okay for me but there is a gap on sides of the face after putting it on and positioning it.My teenagers didn't like that it was so open on the sides - Afraid of germs coming in.  They won't wear -  My face a little fuller so the gaps were not as big.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Love it
content: I recently purchased from another seller because it was $2 cheaper than this price and I wasn’t happy, I’m glad I did that because I realized the difference. These masks do not sound like newspaper and they’re stretchy ! I will keep buying over and over like I have already. I recommend this brand 100%.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: No Wire for Close Fit Around Nose
content: No wire for proper fit. Too small for a man with a large face. Flimsy material. I have not noticed a smell as others mentioned. Would not recommend at all. My wife uses them as an extra layer under a proper mask just to get some use out of them. I recommend reading all the information thoroughly, as well as the reviews before making a decision as to whether or not to purchase.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Never have written a review
content: I have purchased many many things through Amazon. I have never been so hoodwinked as I did with these masks. I did not see bad reviews before I purchased. These reviewers must be getting paid or getting them free. They are like sand paper on your face. I tried to wear one for 30 minutes thinking I would get used to it. No luck . They are also so thin I doubt they are doing any good. I wish I could donate them to someone but who would want one? So disappointed! I gave it 0 stars but they would not let me sun

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: They smell like gasoline
content: As soon as I opened the packaging it smelled so strongly of gasoline it was nauseating. I let them air our for a while and attempted to try one on and getting close to my face I almost threw up from the smell. Got a bad headache and sending them back, not putting that crap on my face.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Cheap and useless
content: These should be used only for show. If you want an actual disposable surgical mask that will protect you and others, this is not for you. If you have two vaccinations and a booster and feel comfortable that everyone around you is vaccinated too, then buy these. If you want actual protection, don't buy these.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Bad chemical smell
content: I bought masks to protect me from COVID but you can’t wear a mask that has a bad chemical smell. I think in the country they are made in, don’t have safety law regarding dangerous chemical dyes.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Downright dangerous masks!
content: We decided to try the candle test and could blow out the flame on the first try. Held them up to the light and the inside layer had split apart! We pulled out one after another and they were ALL like that! It’s like wearing no mask at all.Do not buy these masks for protection.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: If you have to mask up
content: If you have to mask up as much as I do then this is a great product.  Very comfortable, not to big not too small, fits just right.  Does it block everything I’m not sure but I’ve been wearing them for 3 weeks a new one daily and I haven’t gotten sick.  Must be working.  Cant go wrong with black! I will reorder.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Fell apart
content: I tried the first three out of the box and each one of them the seal for wire for the nose was poorly done and the wire fall out.Based on other great reviews I'm guessing the ones I got were just due to a bad run, but still no quality control.Returned and trying another brand

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: As good as any I've tried
content: My 13 year old granddaughter wanted black masks this time, we go through a lot of masks with 3 grandkids!  These had a few that the elastic ear piece wasn't attached on one side, but not many.  They don't break during use like some of the other brands, though, so I do like them.  Some brands break during school, so they have to keep extras in their backpack, but I don't worry as much with this brand.  I wish they made smaller ones for the 5 year old!

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Package unsealed
content: The masks are great but the bag came unsealed and that is unsanitary. Returning this item.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: It’s an okay face mask
content: These masks are a little too heavy for me. The straps on them make the mask pretty snug to my face which causes my face to sweat every time i wear them. and any makeup i’m wearing will come off pretty quick. i bought a pack of masks that looked just like this off amazon previously and they were so much more comfortable but those ones are out of stock so i tried these. they definitely work as a mask but they’re just a little tight and uncomfortable.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: complete junk, definitely not 3 layers
content: I had to switch the masks I purchased, because the ones I normally get were sold out. I went with this one for the first time and they are complete garbage. They say "3 layers" on the package, but they are entirely flimsy and, if they are 3 layers, each layer is apparently microscopic. I'd say that they are about a third of the thickness of the normal 3 layer masks we buy. Please save your money and don't go with this mask. It's a definite lie.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Good bang for buck
content: Great mask, good resealable package that is easy to take with you. The only issue was it feels thin. But honestly it’s a mask and it works and it looks/feels better than those lame blue surgical masks.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Black masks
content: A friend of mine mentioned buying these masks, so I thought I’d give them a try. I love the color. I like that there is a nose piece that bends. The are very thin, so I’m not sure how many gems they are really blocking. They are a bit itchy, so I wouldn’t recommend wearing all day long.Bottom line, great for quick gas station trips..maybe grocery shopping. I wouldn’t recommend wearing for work or school. I will not be purchasing these again.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Big and very light weight, peculiar smell
content: My daughter likes this, but I didn’t bc it has a peculiar smell and it flared my allergies,too thin and I don’t think this has 3 ply compared to the others . But it’s better than the the previous kind that I ordered. My daughter just use double to secure proper protection., she likes it bc it’s light weight and fits her face well.( I have a small face, little bit big and doesn’t fit me well) it’s doesn’t seal well

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Not ideal for a perfect seal
content: The material on this mask is of very good quality. They feel nice on your skin and it's quite thick (it passes the lighter/candle test). As far as the elastic straps they work okay, but they're the rounded kind and not the flat kind. This makes them a bit uncomfortable at times. What really did disappoint, however, is that the metal strap around the nose area meant to help make a seal around your nose and keep the mask steady is of very poor quality and not as flexible as other models. Even after folding on it and creating pressure, it easily opens right up and the masks move around a lot. Also, these run a little on the small side.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: SAVE YOUR MONEY.
content: We ordered this mask in October 2021, and as we progress through the bundle, at least half are defective.  The elastic STRINGS over the ears are not sewn well enough to stay attached and comes apart when attempting to put on.  The clip over the nose is so slight it gaps over the bridge of the nose and does not provide secure coverage.The only positive I can say is the color is as advertised....BLACK.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Please do not buy.
content: I have no idea why the ratings are so high for this.I have used about 50 of the 100 masks. Over 45 of the masks have had one of the ear loops snap on me - you cannot put it on your wrist, pull on it too hard, or stretch it out at all.They smell terrible.The nose bridge flex is terrible.They are so flimsy and thin I doubt they even protect against COVID.Please do not buy.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Masks are very thin.
content: Page said, and I was looking for a 3 ply mask. This mask may have had 3 layers, but they are incredibly thin. Would not wear without a second mask, which defeats its purpose. Also I ordered these because it said they were made in the United States. They were not; they were made in China. All that was included in the package, was a small piece of paper written completely in Chinese.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Fantastic mask! Dental field. Autoclavable
content: Very light, easy to wear not scratchy or harsh on skin. Looks great. Durable mask.  There were comments about a chemical smell honestly there was no smell to me. All mask smell wierd. I work in the dental field and these work perfect for the price and you can autoclave them to be sterile hope this helps

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Unacceptable!!!!!!!
content: I've purchased these mask several times and I've never had a problem with them at all until now. The masks that I was sent are so flimsy you can see right through them!!! There is absolutely no protection provided by these mask!!!!! The box says 3 layers and as you can see this is not that. There's a picture of the all black mask held up in front of a Christmas light and you can clearly see right through. I also provided a picture of the previous mask I purchased from them in front of the same light, it has a white lining that provides protection you can feel and see! It's thick yet breathable. The other mask are so weak I don't feel comfortable wearing them and I will not. I honestly want a refund, so disappointed

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Almost died
content: I was suspicious of these for a long time because they’re the thinnest masks I’ve used so far throughout the pandemic. I really questioned how effective they were because I had no trouble breathing right through them. However, I took an hour nap during a flight and I managed to drool so much in my mask that I practically waterboarded myself and almost drowned. My mask held everything in! So, overall I’m impressed!

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Decent masks, but half (50) were missing the nose clip!
content: No quality assurance. Half of the masks (1 of the 2 packs of 50) were all missing the nose clip. The nose clip is the thin strip of metal that keeps the mask contoured against your nose and cheeks. The other 50 were perfect however. I just wished we would have opened the second defective package first then we would've been able to return the item.We're back to cloth masks again, but now using these underneath them. Not ideal at all.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: So uncomfortable!
content: The disposable masks I've been using for months are currently unavailable, so I tried these.  You get twice as many for just a few bucks more, but they are so uncomfortable. They are irritating to my skin and I do not have sensitive skin. They are a bit rough and itchy.  I teach, so I have it on all day long, but my daughter complained about the irritation as well.  You get what you pay for.  Will go back to the other kind if they become available again but will not reorder these.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Cheaply made - look elsewhere
content: Tried to save some money but as the saying goes - You get what you paid for!  The elastic loops are very thin and too long. It's comfortable because it doesn't fit snuggly on the face. Since it does not fit snuggly it doesn't protect well. I use them as an added barrier over other masks instead of letting them go to waste. I will not be purchasing these again.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: not good for a pandemic
content: the little note that came with it said they are not suitable for many medical facilities, meaning they would not stop disease, infection, etc. so basically useless during covid. however, i have a lot of cloth masks so i’ll just double them up. which works just as well because it’ll strengthen the cloth mask by adding a layer. it ended up working but not for what i intended

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Wear okay but the smell!
content: I keep these for short runarounds in my building and they work, but when I got them and opened the bag, the smell was just awful.  So I dumped them all out of the cello bag they came in, put them in a plastic zip bag.  I kept the top unzipped for a few days and that aired them out nicely, but be forewarned that when you first open the bag, they stink!

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Half broken
content: Half trash.These come in two packs. First pack was great. Second pack was unusable. All the elastic pulled out or was already broken. Waste of money. Would’ve returned but it wasn’t eligible. If you order, check all all the ear bands and make sure they’re not punched thru or pulled out already.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: ABSOLUTELY NOT 🚫
content: These masks are thinner than bible paper — might as well not wear one at all, or wears four of them at once for some kind of protection. They have a strong chemical smell, too. Additionally, both sides of the mask are black, so it’s hard to tell which side is which, resulting in possibly putting it on the opposite way it was previously being worn — disgusting.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: They have a chemical smell to them
content: I like that they are black, they fit well and that they do the job. I don't like that they have a strange chemical smell to them. Its slightly nauseating. They still smell after airing them out of the packaging for a day. I bought them for my kids to use at school and for me at work but, I probably will try to buy a different brand next time.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: No Virus Protection
content: Cheap. There is no filter liner. And they are thin... THIN.  I had to wear 2 mask for my personal comfortable in regards to protecting me against the virus.I will not buy again and I definitely do not recommend.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Could be better but for the price, acceptable.
content: The masks are not the worst quality but they fit too tight around the jawline. The sizing of the masks should be made slightly bigger to accommodates one size fits all. If you need a mask just for an hour or two, this will do the job. However, if you need to wear a mask for longer periods of time, do yourself a favor and spend a little more money on something that is worth it.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Not 3 layer
content: They must not have restrictions on how you market masks but these definitely are NOT 3 layered. You can see right through them. They would be great if they were thicker, they fit nice and stretch well, but you're going to have to double up or wear a cloth mask over this one to make it even slightly effective. Waste of money.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Good value masks
content: Good value for your money. Have never broken on my face. I only remove them for the sake of freedom, but they don't cause discomfort nor heavily effect my breathing and do the job they're supposed to do as far as containing saliva and such.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Uncomfortable
content: These are lightweight but they feel like plastic. I need to use these at work all day and after like 4 hours the band behind my ears felt like they were digging into my skin. The most uncomfortable feeling.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Not too bad
content: As far as filter goes, it's there. You just don't know which side is the inside/outside so it's a total guess. I recommend letting it air out for a few days before wearing. There's a strong smell to these and may create a headache if you wear them for a long time like myself who is a frontline healthcare worker. Maybe if you're running into a store for less than 10 minutes, it will be fine.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Something has changed
content: This is the third time I've bought these masks. The first 2 orders were great! This order it is evident the mask is not the same material. It seriously looks cheap. It does not look as safe and durable of a mask as my previous purchases. When you repeat a purchase you don't expect the quality of the item to change.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: These do not feel like 3 ply
content: Second purchase from this seller - first box was great quality. This time the masks do not seem like 3 layers, are very thin and flimsy. I worry that they would not fill their designated task of protecting anyone. I'm disappointed and was really hoping for that first box I bought before. Now I'm stuck with fifty of these.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Not recommended
content: I bought these masks with hopes of them being great to wear in crowded areas. The first time I tried it on, I felt a pain on my nose. After taking off the mask, I noticed the wire ( fruit/ veggie bag twist) was picking out because the mask wasn’t fully sown properly to secure it in place. This has happened to every mask since. Not a good items

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Cheap, thin, but does the job.
content: These are very thin and the ear straps are very stretchy where I have to tie it so it doesn’t fall off of my nose. Definitely good for quick errands to the store, but not an 8 hour shift at work. I wore one to work and the bend in the nose came out and almost stabbed me in the eye. It looks like a bread tie. Oh well.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: yikes!
content: Unfortunately, I got the batch of masks that smell like gasoline when worn. The masks are not thin and they fit an adult head like normal. None of that matters because of the smell.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: These are practical, comfortable, affordable, but not COVID recommended
content: I ordered these before medical authorities said we needed medical grade, disposable masks. They are very satisfactory otherwise except that the elastic will break free from the mask if you don’t remove them carefully from the ears.  Will likely use them doubled or with a cloth mask for daily outings when I’m not in crowded circumstances.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Basic, good mask but without bendable nose edge.
content: These masks are fine and are a good value but they lack the bendable nose edging to keep more tightly fitted. I have glasses so it doesn't really matter for me but to others it might.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Pill easily
content: You ever get that annoying piece of something inside your mask & you can’t figure out what it is?  Well, these masks have that. Great for short amount of time but if you plan to wear all day, buy something else. I got these to wear to work. I can only wear one for about 4 hours before having to put a new one on.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Look elsewhere! Missing over ear straps.
content:
Video Player is loading.Play VideoPlayMuteCurrent Time 0:00/Duration 0:00Loaded: 0%Stream Type LIVESeek to live, currently behind liveLIVERemaining Time -0:00 1xPlayback RateChaptersChaptersDescriptionsdescriptions off, selectedCaptionscaptions and subtitles off, selectedAudio TrackFullscreenThis is a modal window.



   Most of the masks in the pack were missing at least one of the straps that go over the ear would return but my kids and siblings would throw them away as they would come across the ones without straps. And it’s too much hassle to return but overall don’t recommend getting them. They are literally missing the straps and you can tell they were never put on the masks. Defective pack.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: They smell like chemicals
content: Upon opening the packages you get a strong scent. I tried to give my son one this morning for school and he said he didn’t want to breath that in all day. Currently trying to let them air out.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Horrible, less than paper thin
content: Horrible quality, they are less than paper thin. The metal does not hug around your nose to give you a close fit/ good protection. Within a couple of hours the metal thing was sticking out on my face and I didn’t realize until it poked me(embarrassing). This happened twice in one day. The ear strings are also really loose. I would not recommend to anyone.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Fits small
content: I wasn't expecting this mask to be so small. I'm a female and this mask barely covers my face from the bridge of my nose to the tip of my chin. I need something that I don't have to constantly readjust. I wound up giving them away since they are not able to be returned. I'll be more careful next time.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: No filter horrible to wear with glasses
content: There appears to be no filter and i have never had such a problem with masks fogging up my glasses. It is just the front part of the mask while there is normally a white part on the back side there is no front or back it is just the fabric that is normally the front of the mask. I don't even know what to do with them.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Don’t buy! Strap breaks extremely easy!
content: I have purchased plenty of different brand masks from Amazon and I have not had a problem until this purchase. The straps break extremely easy, I’m talking just putting it on your ears. These masks are worthless, try a different brand, wish I would’ve read the reviews!

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: A little rougher than other masks
content: These masks are a little rougher than every other mask I’ve had. The disposable masks I usually order were out of stock so I decided to give these a try since they had a lot of good reviews but I don’t really care for them. They’re rough, stiff, and a little creased going inward at the top along the nose. They are very breathable though.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Great quality!
content: This mask is the best mask I have found for the ease of singing and teaching.  It is safe....and much easier to use as far as breath.  I have purchased the different singer's masks finding them too hot, too heavy and not easy to breathe in at all.  I highly suggest this particular mask!

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Super cheap, very thin, ear strap breaks easily.
content: I will not buy this particular brand again. The masks felt super thin, cheap and didn’t fit the face properly. The ear straps were very thin and flimsy.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Elastic Ear Loops :(
content: I like the fact these masks do not begin to trickle my nose after 4 hours of use, but the elastic ear loops make them difficult to tolerate for more than a couple hours. I work as a PTA and I keep having to pull them away from my ears throughout the day, or remove my mask any chance I get.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: They feel like sandpaper
content: No mask is completely comfortable but these felt like sandpaper against my skin. I wore one for a day at work and came home with the skin on my face rubbed raw anywhere the mask touched. Don't bother with these.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Happy
content: Very light weight and breathable i’ve saw reviews were people said they smell not really did it come open in the package but I’m not concerned about that so much easier then the regular cloth mask will buy again

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Masks are Ok
content: First impression was disappointment because the masks are a bit thin and appear small. After wearing one for a bit my impression has improved.  The nose piece seem to keep the mask from dropping below my nose but the mask can move upward when talking.  They don't appear to have any smell and it fits my face better than I thought it would.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Too tight
content: Bought these because of the price... We wear masks at work/school because we have to, so to save me a little money I get these masks but it was a bad choice. These masks are too tight that by the end of a long day the back of our ears are hurting. Other than the masks being too tight I do believe they're not too bad.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Very disappointed!
content: Mask material is very rough and scratchy and uncomfortable! Even worse, the nose bridge piece seems to be made out of cheap plastic and doesn't hold its shape so it's impossible to get a good fit and actually get the mask to seal and do its job. Came packaged as a bunch of masks stuffed into a plastic bag. Overall very disappointed that now I'm stuck with these which I'll likely end up throwing away. Don't waste your money on these.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Wasn't expecting white on inside
content: This mask looks like it would serve it's purpose however, I did not realiz it was white on the inside.  The description online did not indicate that at all.  The white interior does not work for me or my family because we hate seeing make-up or lipstick on it just from putting it on.  Had to send these back...still waiting on my credit.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Not reliable and possibly not always safe
content: Fall apart within a couple hours of use…on every occasion.  Had to have a new one each day for school. The seam where the nosepiece is comes apart. Could have taken an eye out and didn’t realize that these were so cheap quality or price wise. Literally went through 3 masks in 8 hours today. Photo shows both used standard black mask and ordered mask, which fell apart.. very thin and smaller in width even

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Mask thin but adequate.
content: It seemed very thin to be three ply so I cut one in half to check; it did have three pieces but they were very thin so I hope they work. The fit is good for me it goes under my chin and up over my nose where the wire bends very easily to seal the top of the mask.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Very soft but not big..
content: I love how soft these masks are but there is not a whole lot of stretch to them and they are not that big. I would say they are perfect for pre teens/ teens. As an adult they fit pretty snug which isn't too bad but then after a few hours of wearing then the back of my ears get a little irritated.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Hit and miss
content: These masks have been hit or miss. I’ve ordered them 3 times. The first package was perfect, the second package was made differently and didn’t hold a seal around the nose. The third package was good like the first one. You take a risk ordering, but if you get the good ones, the fit is really good.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: They're definitely masks
content: We ordered two packs, one of which had masks that were not sealed exposing the inner layer. We sent those back and got a replacement with no issues. They are cheaply made. The ear hooks are stretchy, which is nice, and saves me headaches. They are okay at best. I will use the pack but will not be reordering them.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: You get what you pay for
content: Bought the 100 pack and we’ve almost gone through the whole package because they break EASILY!! The elastic comes off the mask half of the time so it takes 5 masks to get through a day.They also pill up, making it very annoying and itchy defeating the purpose since you’ll be scratching your face and inviting germs in that wayLEVEL UP and pay for a quality product vs wasting money and time on this garbage.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Comfortable masks, but poor quality constrction
content: These were a good value, comfortable material and not too tight. I have a normal size head and need to wear them for 8 hours at work. I went through 3 in the first day because the string kept breaking. I have used similar masks from other brands and never had a string break. So won't be buying these again.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Very disappointed
content: I am very disappointed and upset at the same time. I first ordered this mask and was pleased with the quality; it was 3 ply. So, when I was about to run out, I reordered it and received the shock of my life. The mask is made with a very thin sheet or fabric that feels almost like plastic and thepricewas increased. Now, do you seriously think that customers won't notice the difference. How do you expect customers to keep coming back with such dishonest behavior?

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Lightweight, comfortable AND machine washable
content: By accident I found that these are machine washable, which is great news because I get tons more wear out of them than if I considered them single use (which is what I had been doing). Because they are lightweight, I have just been setting them out on the counter to dry.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: So bad and thin and cheap it didn't even last a day of shopping
content: Do not buy these I took one with me to shop at the mall for a few hours and the little nose piece that forms to your nose came out it was like a cheap bread tie and these are alot thinner than the normal ones and so are the straps my son's snapped we can't rely on these

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Very poorly made
content: The straps break easily and the masks are very thin. I thought the description said 3 ply. They are paper thin. I'm sending them back. Although you get more than most packs, for a few dollars less, they aren't worth it. Cheaper is definitely not always better.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Simple and well fitting
content: I like how non obtrusive these masks are - not bulky or heavy on the face. They are comfortable, light weight and stretch well. A few times I pulled the string out by yanking too hard pulling it off but the cord can be put back in and tied in a little knot.The masks are much nicer than the sterile white/blue ones provided in the office - worth the few dollars.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Horrible masks.
content: These masks arrived in a sealed bag but When I opened the bag, the masks had the plastic wrap ripped open. Possibly due to bad smelling fabric. The bridge of the nose is a twist tie. You can also see through them.do not waste your money. They feel like paper.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Rough
content: I don’t know how these comparable to other disposable masks because I usually use reusable masks, but I bought these for a trip. My daughter and I both found them to be very rough and irritating on our faces. While my daughter has sensitive skin, I typically do not.I do not recommend.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Okay…
content: These masks are VERY thin! I don’t really care for them and probably won’t purchase again. I’ll continue to use them because they are disposable but only good for one or 2 uses. I should have listened to the reviews I saw prior to purchasing. Listen to the reviews about them being thin.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: I'm sure these would be a great deal if 9 out of 10 of them didn't fall apart instantly.
content: Had previously purchased black masks from Amazon with great success. Hadn't ever really considered the brand or seller. Well, these specific masks are horrible. on average, 9 out of 10 of the masks we went to wear broke at the strings either immediately upon putting them on or shortly thereafter. Consider other masks, not these.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Horrible Smell
content: There is a really strong chemical smell coming from these masks. I left them out of the package thinking the smell would fade but it has been two days and they smell exactly the same. I couldn’t imagine wearing these on my face for even 5 minutes. I’m not sure I can get a refund since I opened the package. I do not recommend these at all. I wanted these because black masks look better but I’m gonna stick to the blue masks that don’t have a horrible odor.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Black Disposable Face Masks for Adults
content: I use these masks every day for work and when going in public places. They are comfortable, a good fit for my average face size and stretch enough for those with a larger face. They are lightweight but have provide adequate protection to serve their purpose.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Metal nose pinch sown onto the wrong side
content: So these are fine. If the metal nose pinch was sealed into the right end, they'd be 5 stars. They have it sown upside down so that the accordion effect has to be pulled up your face leading to a harsh ridge constantly rubbing the bottom of your nose instead of a gentle slope down. The ear loops are comfy and a great length to not hurt my ears during the 10+ hrs a day I wear it.  I bought em for $17 and they dropped to $13 a couple days later 🙄 but that's just how it goes! Lol

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: NO. DO NOT EVEN THINK ABOUT PURCHASING THESE.
content: Worst disposables I've ever purchased. The chemical smell was so bad it made me cough to have them on. But what's worse is that these do not have the layer of absorbent material that normal disposables do, which is important for keeping particles you exhale from reaching others.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: As expected.
content: These came quickly and were exactly as expected, other than the smell. They smell SO strong like chemicals I don’t know that I’ll be able to wear them.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Prefect for Work!
content: I wear these masks for 10+ hours at work, and will definitely be buying more before I run out. The masks are very comfortable and breathable. The nose wire works great with my glasses with little to no fogging. I also think it's a nice versatile size. Definitely recommend!

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Do not waste your money!!
content: I got these masks because I was running low and I wanted black ones instead of the blue. They smell HORRIBLE! I had to switch to one of my old masks because I felt like I couldn't do breath well with the smell. They are also very thin and do not feel like they could offer the same later of protection as the other masks I have bought before.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: These were great for liberals or conservatives know better
content: Bought some of these and gave them to my liberal friends to make them feel safer but we all know these things do not work so don’t waste your money on them.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Doesn't fit great around the nose. Fogs glasses
content: If you wear glasses, this will fog em' up. I have to wear this super high, almost into my eyes to keep my glasses from fogging. Doesn't fit tight enough around the nose. I pinch the nose piece together before I put it on and it still is loose.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Worth for the price
content: I haven’t used them all day yet. Just tried one on. They do not come in a box. They come in a vacuum sealed bag all together. They are also a little big. While I do have a pretty small head, adult masks fit me just fine and these are a bit on the baggy side not in the straps but on the mask. The test will be if they fog my glasses, haven’t tried that situation yet.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Good Masks Overall
content: Overall I would recommend these masks because they are comfortable and fit well. The only small issue is that the wire does not tightly fit on the top of my nose when I pinch it. This causes more fogginess in my glasses than other masks that I have used in the past.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Definitely don't recommend
content: The mask uses something akin to what's used to close a loaf of bread to give a bend at the nose.  The problem is that it stretches,  doesn't stay in place and pops out at the oddest times.  I often feel I need to wear 2 to get the most basic of coverage.  Truly disappointed in the quality particularly because of the ratings I reviewed before purchasing.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: NOT SAFE FOR COVID PROTECTION!!
content: I was able to blow out a match while properly wearing one of these masks! You can also see light easily through these while merely holding them up towards a window. These are NOT safe for reducing the spread of COVID-19! I'm returning them immediately!

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Easy and fits well. Nose piece for face fit.
content: Comfortable enough and fits well. Like that it isn’t the blue medical looking kind. The black makes it feel more like a piece of your attire. I mean, it is what it is, a mask. But if I am going to use one it is nice to have one that is easy to throw on and use. Also, mine didn’t smell like some other reviews had said. Overall I am happy with it.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Not protective enough
content: Description says it’s a 3 ply but this is way too thin for that. It did not pass the candle test as well. It’s not comfortable to wear too.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Don't buy.. false advertising
content: This is not a 3 ply mask.  You can see through the mask and has a strong chemical smell to them. I placed the mask on my face; and I started having pain on the left side of my chest and my head hurts from the smell.  I still had a couple of black 3ply mask left that I previously bought from another company and compared them with the new ones.  False advertisement not 3 ply; and the mask has a smell; bad quality; don't buy these mask because they are only 1 ply masks and are not good for protection  from any viruses or pandemic.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Cheaply made
content: These mask were cheaply made. I try to keep a large quantity of mask in my home because my children attend school and they are in sports. These mask were definitely not worth the money. More than half the pack ear loops broke as soon as my kids put them on or while at school. I will definitely never order this brand again.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Lightweight but cheaply made
content: I ordered these as they were inexpensive. It came in a sealed bag with 2x packs of 50. I've only had them for 2 weeks and have yet to open the second bag but so far I've found 2 that didn't have the ear loop on one side and have had 3 ear loops break off while putting them on. Not very durable at all.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Quality not as expected.
content: These masks are lightweight, however, I expected the quality to be slightly better.  I thought the ear loops were going to be slightly thicker than expected but they weren't.  This was my second pack that I've ordered because I was trying to find the same ones that a friend had which had the thicker ear loops that I was looking for. Guess I should double check with my friend before ordering a third time.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: They must have changed them- second time buying they are CHEAP now
content: I am a nurse, I started a new job in which I can wear my own masks. I like to wear two masks just for comfort. Anyways, I’m July I bought these masks and I loved them so i bought them again a few weeks ago. They must have changed how they made them because they are so CHEAP now. Everything about them has changed. They feel paper thin now. I wore one for 15 minutes and the fibers began to make me itch and it was unbearable. I really don’t give reviews often but wanted to let everyone know they have changed! Thanks!!

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Works great!
content: The mask does what it is intended for wand that is to protect myself an others during this pandemic. Both sides are black so you can wear it whatever way. They are easier for me to breathe with than cloth masks. Also if I tighten it to my nose, I don’t get foggy glasses!

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Don't waste your money
content: Half of these the strings werent attached and the ones that were actually attached did not even last an hour. My kids need these for school during the day. Def not purchasing again. I'll order elsewhere and not on Amazon for masks.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Cheap, thin, flimsy
content: I ordered this product back in May and it was good. Material was appropriately thick, sturdy, and comfortable. I ordered again this month after running out and it’s like tissue paper. The material is scratchy against my skin and it’s so paper thin that has no integrity to stay in place when I talk. Very disappointed this product went so downhill.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Half good
content: The masks arrived in two plastic bags (presumably with 50 masks in each). One bag is full of great masks. They're lightweight and comfortable with a good nose wire. The other bag is full of masks with no nose wire. I wear glasses, so wearing a mask without a nose wire causes my glasses to fog up. Thus half of the masks I received are useless to me. I contacted the seller and haven't heard back. It would seem that this seller lacks adequate quality control, so just be aware that if you order these masks, some or all of them may be defective. But the ones that aren't defective are great.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: All the nose pieces are off center
content: I like the color and fact lightweight but all of the masks pretty much have their nose pieces off center and makes it difficult to wear them.  I already opened them so I can't return them.  I would never buy them again.  I amcery disappointed.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Great
content: They are everything I needed them to be. They are as comfortable as a mask is going to be. They mold to the shape of my nose so they cause minimal fogging when I’m in glasses. Plus they are in inexpensive. I’ll continue to repurchase.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Good Value All Right…
content: They’re definitely a good deal for your money. I purchased 100 masks for about $10. They’re pretty flimsy and very thin, although knock on wood the ear loops are secure and more comfortable than others. The mask itself is a little scratch, but nothing crazy. It might bother people with sensitive skin. My biggest complaint however is that they are not long enough to cover my face without fogging up my glasses, which isn’t too much of an issue with other masks. I don’t dislike them enough to return them and they could be worse. They are handy to have around, but I wouldn’t buy again.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Rough
content: Good amoumt of masks for the money... But...... They are very uncomfortable. They feel like you are wearing brown paper towels, like from public restrooms, on your face.Using these until I can find some soft ones, but not cloth. I guess good backups at least.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Does the Job
content: Works like they should. I got these because I kept losing my reusable masks. I actually prefer these to the reusable ones honestly. The nose wire helps to not fog up my glasses as much, and I like the coverage/stretch on these.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Worst mask I’ve ever worn! DO NOT BUY!
content: These are top rated? Compared to what? The elastic broke on the first mask before I ever put it on. The nose clip does not bend and stay in place, making this mask a hazard to wear because there isn’t a seal against your face. The elastic pulled hard on my ears after only a few hours of wear. And the pleats don’t open enough to keep the mask from rubbing against your nose. And the material is scratchy. I’ve worn other disposable masks that were more comfortable. I would not recommend these. DO NOT BUY.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Dissatisfied with this
content: the product was not what I expected...this was the 2nd time ordering and it was totally different this time around... the product was very thin and flimsy, the string broke trying to pull it out of the package and seem to be a totally different product from the 1st time...totally different package and quality from the 1st even tho I used the same link to reorder from the ones I ordered at first.  the 1st time I was completely satisfied... I'm so dissatisfied that I'm going to be returning them.
