product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Poor fit
content: These look great but don't fit well at all. If you have a nose, this mask will be uncomfortable. It's very flat on the nose and not shaped properly for comfort or safety. The wire over the nose won't crimp or tighten around it. There are gaps around the side where it should fit snugly. I can't recommend these at all.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Bendable nose bridge piece falls out almost immediately
content: I'm not sure if I got a bad batch but the nose bridge piece isn't sewn in or glued properly so it falls out upon first wearing, which then makes the mask slide up & down a lot. Otherwise they are comfortable aside from that critical flaw.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: they do not stretch
content: the don't stretch and go right back to there original shape! Don't buy

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Black Masks met expectations.
content: Masks are like the normal blue masks except they are black.  The band is even a little bit more comfortable.  I am happy with the purchase. I wanted a color different from the blue mask and black goes with most of what I wear and I am required to wear a mask at work. The elastic bands are a little bit more comfortable too.  It is a win win for me.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: very thin
content: Although I didn't detect a bad smell as read in some reviews, these mask are comfortable but so thinI question that they are 3 ply.  My advice is to double mask as recommended if you don't have aN95.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Mask
content: Since I bought them. I have broke  about 10 of them...Snap where elastic meets mask... I have since bought from another company... IM not to worried about getting $ back... Now some of the mask have lasted me quite a few days' of use. While others', last just a few seconds'. As IM putting around my ears'....

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Not as good as the ones I previously bought
content: Not as good as the one I previously bought. It smells and the elastic has no elasticity, so mask is loose.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: NOT WORTH IT
content: Not worth it. Out of the pack the strings were already broken. The mask smelled very bad with a chemical. The mask are not 3 layers because they are so thin. very thin.. would not advise wearing during pandemic.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Nose Piece Insert
content: Great mask in terms of comfort and breathability, however, the nose piece that's inserted within the mask that allows the wearer to mold it better over their nose and upper cheeks keeps puncturing out of the mask's fabric. This has happened with every mask I've worn out of the box. It looks like a garbage bag twisty-tie. It's a great grab-and-run type mask, but not one that's good for wearing throughout an entire day.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Sturdy and comfortable masks
content: I keep going back and reordering these masks. My teens prefer them for masking up all day at school. They like the black color. They are really comfortable. They seem to be high quality for an excellent price.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: VERY poor quality; scratches nose
content: The material was VERY thin and the nose bar piece comes off every mask.  Every time I put one on, the metal piece that wraps around the nose starts to scratch my nose and then falls off. I will never purchase these again. They are HORRIBLE.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Great for my kids
content: I bought this large pack because my 13 and 16 year old kids have to wear masks at school daily. They like the black color more than the medical blue ones. It's a good purchase and hopefully we won't be hunting around for lost masks every morning.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: 50% chance of missing strap
content: Got 2 separate bags in the pack and we noticed there was a high chance my wife would pull out a mask that had one of the straps missing. The first bag of mask seemed to all be fine, just not the second bag.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: I like how they fit my face
content: I like how they fit my face, just don’t like how they don’t really tighten on the nose part.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Cheap and thin
content: Poor quality, recommend buying something else, promised 1 day delivery but did not arrive until 3 days later. Very thin, cheaply made mask. Will have to use 2 or 3 mask to get the same result as other mask

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Best mask!
content: Super light weight, excellent fit, I can actually breathe thru this mask with great ease.. Would love to have it in more colors. Best mask I have found, and like most of us, I have lots of different ones..

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Cheap
content: These feel super cheap and thin and come in a plastic envelope, not a box. I am fully immunized, so they’ll do to comply with the mask mandate in Las Vegas, but I don’t expect them to protect me from anything.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Strong chemical smell
content: Just got them today and masks have a Very strong chemical  smell, Will not be using them.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Just reordered
content: These are exactly what I need. I recently had surgery and my family with cloth masks had to change to N95s they had on hand but they told me my mask was within guidelines. I just reordered and plan to continue. They are comfortable and breathable.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Love these
content: These masks are great quality. Sometimes I misplace my masks so having these making me worry less about losing it. They work great and are thick enough to make me feel protected, but thin enough to allow me to breath and feel very lightweight in comparison to my cloth and fabric masks.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: So rough and itchy
content: I have been wearing black surgical masks to teach in and usually buy them from a popular big box store. These are way rougher and scratchier than any I have ever purchased. It also seems like they are giving me mascne. :(

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Super lightweight, because they are super thin
content: I don't like these and don't feel like they are providing protection. While they are indeed 3 layers, the layers are so thin that I'm not sure they protect at all. I am not wearing them for that reason.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Don't waste your money
content: Straps break so easily.  You can't even adjust without straps snapping off.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Cheaply made
content: These are very thin, almost feels like paper. They also have a strong smell to them. I’ll suggest to look elsewhere because these are not it. Sure they’re ok if you need one in case masks are mandatory somewhere but if you’re looking for actual protection, don’t waste your money.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Super Flimsy
content: Do not like this product, there is a weird smell when you put them on but it eventually goes away. This product is very flimsy and the ear straps come apart so easily, they’ve broken simply taking them out of the package or taking the mask off. The quality is very very cheap. Not worth the purchase.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Don't waste your money
content: If I could give no stars I would.  The cheap metal piece that goes over the nose area has fallen out ON EVERY mask I have used.  If I hadn't used any I would return them.  Do not waste your money.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Manufacturer
content: More than 1/2 of the masks weren't usable due to the how the manufacturer plastic wrapped them. To be clear, they were NOT damaged in shipping. They were bent and creased in all the wrong places.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Good
content: I got then for working out and they are good quality. I find these a little more difficult than other masks to get placed on my nose just right so my glasses don’t fog up. But, I’m satisfied with them.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Very thin, cheap materials used
content: I have already worn about 5 masks and the metal piece that folds on your nose has torn through the mask on all of them. The masks are too lightweight, doesn't feel like I'm being protected.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: ear loops seemed loose
content: I have purchased this type of mask before but this batch was different.  The elastic strings that hook around your ears seemed loose and less elastic.  The mask still worked but the fit was not tight or snug.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Tight fit
content: I have been wearing medium-ish size masks and this one feels it presses on my nose tip too much.  I try readjusting, but then the top edge is under by lower eyelid and feels too big.  My husband cannot wear them as he typically needs a larger size.  They pull on his ears and are uncomfortable to wear for multiple hours.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Cheaply made
content: These are very cheaply made.  Thin, flimsy, no nose bridge.  Worst mask.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Smell
content: Honestly because of the smell it is a compete waste of money.  I will not be comfortable wearing something that has a chemical smell for any amount of time.  I will let them sit outside and hope for the best, but we have to be mindful of what we are breathing in, even through our own mask!

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: The masks that I received were cheaply made
content: I ordered a pack of 100 so I wouldn’t worry about buying masks for a while. The price was good and I received them in a timely manner. The problem I have with the masks is that the straps are very cheaply made. What I mean by that is that 5 out of ten that we tried to use had the straps break. I believe that they might of been defective because I have never had straps break like that with any other kind of face mask. I did not try to get a refund but maybe I should of. Buy at your risk. I ordered them back in September 2021. I hope this helps

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Terrible masks, terrible nose strip
content: These masks are rough and the nose strip does not bend. Do NOT buy these, there are better masks.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Poor quality masks
content: I’m not sure if I received a bad batch BUT they kept snapping where the ear string connects to the mask. I’ve used these types before -probably a different brand of this has never been an issue. All 5 of us in my family had the same experience. It’s as if they were glued but it didn’t hold or take. Would never buy these again. I went through the pack in about 2 days!!

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Great Mask
content: This is a great Lightweight loosefitting mask, perfect that for those who do not like wearing masks. I need a larger fit and theses fit me great.  My only complaint Is that they wouldn’t be good for somebody who wears glasses, because the nose piece does not pinch down all the way. Good thing I have contacts.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Good product
content: Great quantity for the costVery comfyDoesn't smell or have weird odorsThe black color is a plus making them easy to wear with just about anythingEasy to travel with

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Poorly made and prone to failure
content: About 1 in 3 of these masks fail within a few hours or even minutes of regular use. The glue holding the strap and mask together seems to be inadequate. Very disappointing - will not buy again.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Very uncomfortable mask.  Would not recommend
content: This mask is very irritating  to your skin, have never had the issue  before.  Elastic is also  very tight  and I am a petite woman  weighing 100 pounds.  Would not recommend  to anyone.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Maybe only for kids
content: These work okay for my kids but, as an adult, I find them very small and the ear loops are tight. The material also feels a bit cheap and papery, unlike medical-grade 3M masks. Okay when u need a quick covering or if your face is small.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Terrible
content: Whenever I pulled a mask out of the pack, the strap broke. If I wore it into the store, It broke while in the store. I understand that they are disposable, but I would assume that they could at least last for a grocery store trip.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Bad!
content: WORST MASKS I EVER USED! I SHOULD HAVE READ REVIEWS AND WATCHED THE VIDEOS BEFORE I ORDERED THESE MASKS. STRAPS BREAK RIGHT AWAY! NO WAY COULD THEY GET ANY MORE CHEAPLY MADE! I WILL NEVER BUY AGAIN!

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Useless the straps tear off of the mask very easily!
content: Bought these for work and they keep busting everyday for the ost 3 days now no matter how careful i al about taking them off. DO NOT BUY! I don’t even know if I can return them after using 3 of them. They’re horrible!

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Comfort
content: Love the comfort and style of mask and easy to go with your outfit or makeup.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Super soft and breathable
content: In my dumb county, we are still under a mask mandate. These are a lot more comfortable than the blue and white medical masks. They are soft and it isn’t hard to breathe with this on.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Nose wire is so weak!
content: Anyone with glasses is going to have a hard time keeping their glasses from fogging. The nose wire is so weak it cannot make a tight seal on the nose bridge. Therefore, glasses fog super easily. Annoying. I wish I didn’t buy them Bc I wear glasses everyday. I will use them and give some to coworkers and friends.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Practical
content: It has a chemical smell, but it goes away after you air it out. I let it air out for at least a minute before wearing them. Aside from that it’s great, plus it hides make up stains.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Nice masks
content: My kids have to wear masks in school. They like wearing these better then the regular blue ones. I put a few in the bookbags just in case. These are great masks that serve their purpose.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Comfortable. Great for single use.
content: These black masks are comfortable and fit like a standard surgical mask. I personally don’t reuse them, but they could probably withstand multiple uses as long as they aren’t soiled.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Quality for price
content: Comfortable and not as cheaply made as some of the other disposible face masks I've received. I don't think these would be comfortable if you are a larger person as the actual mask face coverage isn't large (doesn't cover as much of my chin and I have a relatively small face).

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: So so masks
content: These are a slightly smaller and fit tighter than others so full size folks be aware. Also being black on both sides is annoying since I'm used to white on one side. But they work.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: I don’t know what smell they are talking about but these are awesome!
content: These masks are the best they never rip the stupid ear thing and they don’t smell like the others said I. The reviews.. buy with confidence trust me ! They last for a long time without ripping, and you can wash them in the wash machine because I keep forgetting to empty my best pockets and they smell great after the wash .. and they still don’t rip , up to you but  im telling you the best masks out there

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Cheap and defective
content: Most of the masks do not have a wire across the top and the ones that do the wire is small and to the left or right not in the middle so there is no way for it to be adjusted over the nose. These have a chemically smell and the loops pop off very easily. There is also no indication of which side is the outside. I am returning these and will definitely not be buying again

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Uncomfortable and breaks
content: The elastic bands are too tight around the ears, and the mask material is very plasticy. The ear bands broke off without pulling on them on every one that I’ve worn so far. They’re very bad quality

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Mask are made to cheap
content: I bought this mask since I got tired of wearing the Standard Blue ones, but the quality can leave at the door, the mask has a thin layer or protection. not worth the price you pay yourself

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Missing wire
content: These masks would be great if OVER half of them didn’t have a missing wire, small wire, or wire stiched to the side making them unusable. The ongoing joke in my family is how many masks do you need to pull out to get a functioning mask: the winning is 8 duds to get to a winner. Such a waste of money. Don’t waste your money.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Comfortable
content: Love these maskes.  Snug tightly around the nose and comfortable around the ears

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Cheaply Made
content: This product is cheaply made. The plastic that goes over nose always protrudes out the mask and stabs u. Bought 2 packs and from both packs i have used about 15 masks and they all have same issue. Once u put it on you have to keep it on because if you try to move it or put it back on it will just fall apart.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Junk
content: These masks were a waste of money. The ear strings break off easily. Don’t buy them. Just no🥺

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Some of the ear loops may easily dislodge.
content: When the ear loops are intact I have found this to be a very comfortable and effective mask to wear for several hours. I am not happy when the ear loops detach before wearing.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Extremely thin, Definitely NOT 3 PLY
content: These are extremely thin and does not feel like 3 PLY at all. I've purchased 3 PLY masks before and these are definitely not it. Completely deceiving. Do not waste your money.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Broken nose pieces
content: I've worn 2 of these masks on 2 different days now and both of them have had the nose piece pop out after 3-4 hours of use.  The overlapping part of the mask comes apart and the piece (which is white) shows then eventually falls out altogether.  The rest of the mask has held up fine and been comfortable to wear.  Disappointed.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Was Open
content: There was no seal and the bag came opened. It's not safe or sanitary to use.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Not Comfortable
content: This mask is  light weight and I like the color, however when I wore it, I did get hot and began to perspire. The mask did not soak up any of the sweat and I preceded to sweat more under it. It’s definitely a one time wear. I would not purchase it again.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Fits good, not so soft
content: The product is durable, fits to your face well. But the texture is a little rough and after wearing for a long period fells scratchy on your nose and chin. I would buy again.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Teacher Approved!
content: These are my favorite masks! I am a teacher and have to wear a mask all day, every day. Disposable ones are the most comfortable for me and the all-black option is just perfect!

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: THEY SMELL LIKE CARCINOGENIC CHEMICALS
content: I didn’t bother reading the reviews when I saw they had 4 stars with so many reviews. These masks have a horrendous chemical smell. Don’t bother buying them. You’ll be returning them soon.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Comfortable & Breathable
content: We love these masks. They’re breathable and I love that they’re black. Probably the most comfortable masks I have bought to date. Highly recommend. And the price is fantastic. Definitely need to stock up for school.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: The elastic breaks easy
content: Very cheaply made. The ear elastic breaks while delicately handling them. They have an odd smell. Broke almost every one while pulling them put of packaging or putting them on.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Exactly the same quality as I've gotten before
content: This was the best deal on the internet.  Dirt cheap and completely adequate as a daily disposable.  I often wear a cloth mask over it.  I would get these again although I'm switching to N95's for situations where I may be in close contact with folks.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: CHEAP!!!
content: Don’t waste your money. These are the cheapest masks I’ve ever purchased. They’re so thin they’re basically see through. And the wire around the nose may as well not be there. It does nothing to close that area.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Work well
content: I liked these for the most part. We never had an issue with them breaking. Mostly they were comfortable. The main reason I gave 4 stars is that the nose wire was off center by a lot. This caused us not to be able to close or the mask tightly.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Masks Are Too Thin
content: Thea masks are pretty comfortable, but if you blow air through them you can feel a little from the other side. Therefore, they don’t offer great protection. I would not buy them again.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Goes with everything
content: These are simple and light weight. I feel like I’m protecting those around me as well as my vaccinated self. Enough to give everyone on the family a handful so they are not stuck without a mask.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Wouldn’t buy again. 2nd time ordering and quality is half of the first order.
content: Purchased these about a month back and they were comfortable, didn’t fall apart and didn’t come apart. product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Not the same as last time
content: I have ordered these several times, and found them to be comfortable. Almost like cloth. This time they feel like they were made from butcher paper. They irritate my face, and I have to wear them for hours in a medical facility.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Only half were in working condition
content: They are good masks but half weren’t connected on the ears and others snapped when you do the smallest tug. I have a small face so it’s not as if I was stretching them.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Wouldn’t buy again
content: They do the job of a face mask by…. masking your face, but in comparison to other mask you can get something that feels more sturdy and a lil thicker. My main issue with they face mask though it that the metal insert to secure the mask over your nose comes on every mask i put on. I wear glasses also so a snug fit around my nose is a must but the insert falls out and i’m left with a flimsy piece of fabric over my face. I’m gonna still use them for now but will not buy again.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Great Light weight mask for the price
content: I ordered these because they were black, and despite the negative reviews about smell they do not smell at all. They fit well at the nose and sit around my face fine. They are pretty light weight and breathable.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Terrible quality-DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!
content: The quality of these masks are terrible!! The metal piece on the nose is so thin it comes out constantly on every one of them, i basically have to throw out 4 a day.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Terrible masks!!!
content: If I could give these masks 0 stars, I definitely would!! I’ve made a huge mistake buying these masks! The only accurate part of this description is that they are “light weight” because They are PAPER THIN! The nose clip is flimsy, short, and off center so you can even put the mask on correctly. Save yourself the trouble and don’t buy these masks!!

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: No!

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: My favorite every day mask

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: TOO BIG

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Don’t buy these
content: Not good material, I didn’t realize why I was breaking out so much all of a sudden. Before these I wouldn’t really break out but as soon as I started wearing these I noticed I broke out so much until my sister borrowed some and told me she had the same reaction. If you have sensitive skin do not buy these.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: The metal strip on the mask does not bend

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Great value and durable.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Poor quality
content: There was not 1 out if the 5 we tried that the string didn’t break off the mask immediately. We’ve been ordering masks off Amazon for a long time and these are by far the worst quality masks thus far. Don’t waste your money on these!

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Great Buy
content: This was a on the fly buy, and I couldn't be happier with them. No bad smell and  very comfortable to wear. I highly recommend you buy these, great price and a forever from now on need in daily life. Mask up, social distance, and stay safe folks, I will buy more for sure✌️❤️☺️🙏

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Poorly made

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Worth buying

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Too thin and flimsy

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Great for price

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Great masks

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: They do make your face quite warm especially on a hot and humid day.
content: They’re fine as far as a face mask goes but to wear for an extended period of time (while shopping etc.) they do trap heat on your face which makes you even more u comfortable especially on a hot and humid day when you’re trying to run errands. I’m not sure if it’s because they’re black and attracts heat or the material it’s made with that’s not breathable but definitely pack a few as you will be changing these face masks often.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: You can breathe in this mask.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask

It’s very loose and the strings are loose as well. Don’t recommend buying even if it’s cheap. Keep yourself safe with good masks. I wasted money on these masks that probably don’t even work well. If i’d want it to work i would have to put 2 masks on top of this. it’s bs! don’t buy it.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Comfortable/look great
content: I'm hoping this material is effective for the virus but it's very comfortable NOT like a lot of the other disposable mask that are almost crunchy paper 😷

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask

The ear loops are loose on me but that wasn’t the main problem… it’s super thin & NOT 3 ply. The material/quality also looks a little cheap but maybe it’s because it’s so thin. Unfortunately, can’t get these refunded.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Great

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Go-To Disposable Face Covering
content: These are our go-to disposable face masks. We wear reusable masks, too — but we like to keep some of these in our vehicles so we are prepared. My only issue with these is a slight musty odor - likely from wherever they were stored before delivery.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Mostly Soft
content: I’ve been purchasing these masks for quite some time. Some batches have been super soft, but others have been extremely stiff & scratchy. Generally these masks are spot on for comfort. My ears don’t suffer from short pulling bands anymore.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Not bad
content: It’s a good product the weird  part is isn’t come in a box it’s more like pack in a isolated bag (looks like they share the product in different packages

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Good Product

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Flimsy masks

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: No Quality Control
content: You get what you pay for. There are probably 50 good masks in the 100. The nose wire in many is stuck at one side and not in the middle or is not present at all. The ear loops are not well attached and frequently break loose. I wasn't expecting much, I didn't get much. But they are breathable and light-weight.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Cheap
content: The wire above the nose that should conform to your nose doesn’t. It doesn’t stay in place so if you wear glasses, it’s awkward.  These are fine for a quick run in and out of somewhere but not to wear for any length of time.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: The straps break!
content: The strap breaks as soon as I put the mask on. I’ve been through 30 in a couple of days. Of course I should’ve purchased the ones I’ve gotten in the past but trying to save money I got these. Don’t waste your money.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Paper
content: If u like very thin to nothing then this will work and this won’t Protect you ! But they are very thin .. kids like it because it’s like wearing nothing

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Nose clip/wire doesn't work
content: Bought these earlier in the year, unfortunately a 100 masks total, and every single mask's nose wire is useless. They don't bend to the shape of your nose if you pinch it like other masks do. They don't fit snug at all in this area, and it the wire feels more like plastic. Masks are supposed to fit snug and not let air escape to serve their purpose. I wear a fabric mask with a nose wire over one of these so they won't go to waste.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Good disposable face masks at a great price!
content: Great price for 100 disposable face masks in black!  Packaged very well and has a certified sticker that comes with it.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Lightweight
content: I like the black color & the lightweight material.  The straps are a little bit shorter than the ones I bought at Costco.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Excellent quality and value.
content: Excellent quality mask. Our choir used them in a concert this week and they looked very professional with the choir wearing black clothing for a uniform look. The masks were an excellent value. I will definitely buy them again.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Possible eye irritant for sensitive skin
content: My partner and I both have sensitive skin and these irritated our eyes. We both noticed that our eyes became itchy after sometime wearing this, in the corners of our eyes. They have a bit of a weird smell too out of the package. The smell goes away quickly though, and they're honestly pretty comfortable. They don't fog my glasses either. If you have sensitive skin these might not work for you, but I don't think they're bad

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Great masks, perfect fit, NO ODOR!!
content: Soo glad I took a chance besides negative reviews . Most importantly to note is there is NO ODOR !! Fit is perfect, stretchy ear bands are comfortable, not tight at all. Wish they were individually wrapped..but I put them in ziploc bag.Great purchase. timely delivery as described  !!

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Garbage
content: I purchased these masks after wearing another brand’s black mask almost since the beginning of the pandemic. Out of using five, three have ended up like this with a twisty tie coming out of the nose. These are a poor quality do not order. I NEVER once had this happen when using  another brand for over one year. GARBAGE

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Value brand but good quality
content: Had an event and needed to order masks for those that "forgot" theirs. These worked out perfectly. I dont think they'd be good for multiple uses but we're getting for my need.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Good mask but a little small for adults
content: These are good masks but the size is small for adults. My teen daughters like them for school but they also complain about them being to small

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Plastic nose piece
content: Purchase two times prior- the third time it was obvious the metal noes piece was switched out for a plastics noes piece. Don’t waste your money.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Chemical smell
content: Will buy again

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Don't leave home with just 1
content: About one in five of these will have the earloop band detach from the mask unexpectedly. Fortunately, most of the time it happens as you're putting the mask on. But sometimes, you've left home and are going into a store, or already in the store, when it fails.  And these failures are occurring with my 13yr old daughter, so its not like we're trying to strap these on to a watermelon.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Perfect for school
content: These are the only masks my teens will wear. Light weight, disposable. Will continue to buy until COVID decides to disappear.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Great!
content: I have ordered this great deal on masks a few times. The nose clip is comfortable and the masks are breathable. Work great with glasses!

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Great quantity with low quality straps
content: I like that they were not expensive, however the masks did break every day. I recommended having an extra close by just in case.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Great for everyday use
content: We live in an area where mask are required pretty much all the time. I keep a supply of clean masks by the front door for my family so it is convenient to grab on the way out. The price for 100 masks was great, shipping was fast, and the masks were exactly as I expected them to be. Would recommend, will order again.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Needs improvement
content: Usually I try so hard not to be harsh and believe other reviews but wth? I just opened it since I finally ran out of the other mask I have (different brand btw) and most of these mask are missing the strap. Yeah that’s no fun when you’re looking mask after mask to see if it’s good or not.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: nose wire doesn’t work
content: the nose wire at the top is super uncomfortable and doesn’t bend enough so fit a nose. definitely not covid-safe

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Cheap quality
content: I wish I would have just repurchased from a different seller. You can feel how thin and chintzy these are as soon as you open the bag. I guess I'll shove these in the back of a drawer for emergency use only.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Fit
content: ...The mask on my face seems too small would fit a child perfectly. Not for average older male with long face.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Useless - do not buy - break so easily and come broken
content: These were the worst masks I’ve ever purchased. Many came broken and most of them have broken within a couple minutes of wearing them. Plus the material feels really harsh on your face. Don’t buy these, I’ve bought a different bulk pack of these in the past and they were wayyyy better.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: These masks are poor quality, the elastic for the ear area easily rips. I don’t recommend.
content: Cheaply made. Everyday use.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Unsanitary
content: This product arrived completely wide open. Bag and zip lock all totally open with masks uncovered and all the way exposed. This is SO unsanitary. I do not recommend this purchase.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Worth the price but have had more comfortable masks before
content: Overall, the price for what you get is worth it. However, I feel like the mask itself could be a bit more comfortable.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Dressy Looking Mask
content: I really like these masks,  I think that they look more dressy than the blue, very happy that I ordered them!!

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Does the job but…
content: Does the job but “plasticky” feel to both sides traps moisture, so not comfortable for wear all day or outside when it’s ok. But if you’re inside/ wearing short period of time it works fine.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Nicely made but thin.
content: I found these comfortable for my face and ears but they feel quite thin. I get more coverage with two masks layered together.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: No Nose Clip
content: I guess the batch I received they missed the nose clip. after using 20 of the masks I realize the last 80 dont have nose clips as described. Be advised.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: If you have a small face like me, you will have to shorten the ear loops.....
content: I bought a whole bunch in order not to run out of masks.  The only thing I do have to do is make a knot on both sides for the earloop.  I have a small face and it is the only way the mask will fit properly.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Each mask broke when trying to put it on
content: Something is wrong. Each mask strap broke immediately when putting it on. Maybe a bad batch? Returned them.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: You Get What You Pay For
content: Lightweight and a great value but these masks turn "fuzzy" very quickly so I go through multiples in a day because I can't take the feeling of being constantly tickled.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Elastic breaks way too easily.
content: Not a good value due to ear elastic breaking. Sometimes breaking as soon as you put them on. Sometimes it breaks after a few minutes of wearing it.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: poor quality
content: Wow, such a quality! 10 pieces without string and the amount of 50. I'm really curious about how the producers expect me to wear it

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Crooked
content: One of the ear loops is shorter than the other one so they fit on crooked. Guess you get what you pay for.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Breaks easily
content: Returning these and going back to another product I bought before. 2 of 3 out of the box snapped while putting over ears.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Don’t Buy
content: Bought these black masks for my 13 & 16 year olds to wear to school. The elastic on the first 6 my oldest put on snapped & mask tore. He found one that stayed together only to have elastic break at school.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Doesn’t fit properly
content: The nose wire doesn’t bend or stay bent to prevent air flow; uncomfortable ear loops also. The only thing this mask is doing is meeting the requirement to wear a mask. I am quite disappointed.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: masks are missing a strap on one side!
content: Over 30% of the masks are unusable because they are missing a strap on one side! We will be returning this item.When the mask has two straps then it is fine. No issues with the masks when you can actually wear them.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Great deal for 100!
content: Amazing shipping super fast within a few hours and I love black so very comfy and affordable. Recommend for sure and hope to buy more!

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: My favorite
content: These masks feel better than any of the other masks I’ve ever tried. They sit on my face the best and feel very nice and comfortable. There is a slight chemical smell but I find it pleasant. They smell clean and fresh. I’d rather them smell like cleaning chemicals as opposed to mildew and mold.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Not durable. There are better options
content: I’ve had a lot of them break before use just trying to put them on. I’ve bought better for cheaper. Keep looking.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Black disposable mask. Very comfy.
content: Love the comfort. Very lightweight and very breathable. Great for school kids. I would definitely recommend.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Great masks for $10
content: Will definitely be buying more once they run out.I wear glasses and the cloth masks fog up my glasses alot. Plus these actually allow me to be able to breath while wearing them.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: These are OK in a pinch.
content: As far as disposable masks go, these are just OK. I don't have high expectations but the quality of these masks are much lower than other disposable masks.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Super thin
content: The first time we bought these they were better quality. Second time around they were so thin and cheap

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Finally KN95s that are completely comfortable
content: Was having trouble finding KN95s that fit well but aren’t too tight around the ears. These are perfect.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Terrible on your face
content: The first time my son and I wore these I kept thinking how uncomfortable I was. It was so rough on my face but I was pushing through to set a good example for my kid. Eventually I broke and said how much I hated the mask to which he said he was doing the same thing I was. Now I have 98 masks left that we will never use.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Ineffective
content: These masks did not reassure me that I was safe going out-n-about on short store runs. I recommend using two or three if you must purchase them, but find something more secure/medical with better filters. The package was awful too; didn’t  seem very sanitary. IMO, not the one!

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Works but be ready for the odor
content: Works as described but the smell is overwhelming. I've purchased other packages of masks and there usually is an odor but I haven't experienced anything near this strong.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Comfortable and sturdy for daily use
content: Tried another brand that was slightly cheaper and those mask smelled bad. Also had a white wire for the bend around the nose that popped out of all the mask. However this brand is as expected smells okay and is comfortable and wire stays in place.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: CHEAP
content: I have not gotten more than 3 or 4 wearings out any of these masks before one of the straps breaks. I know they are disposable, but these are TOO disposable!

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Low Quality - Avoid
content: These are low quality masks they come packaged poorly and crumpled. Smell like burnt plastic too, and too thin.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: I like these best.
content: If I have to wear a mask, which I don’t like, I prefer these. I am not getting acne from the mask with these as I did with my other ones.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Horrible quality
content: The first mask that I took from the box instantly fell apart when I tried to put it on.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Terrible. Straps snap off with very light use
content: Terrible product. The straps snap with very light use - I only opened two masks and both of them had the straps snap off with very light use (placing on and off). Absolutely awful product.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Great Buy!
content: Came rather quickly. Packaged well and traveled well. Works well & offers a bit a fashionable option (as much as one can have).

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Strings break easily

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Trash

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Great mask!  It’s comfortable and doesn’t easily break. Very satisfied with this product

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Quality

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Not the same
content: Not the same as the masks I purchased 2x before even though it's from the same company. I liked them the past 2x, but not this time. They are smaller than the previous masks and my face was bothered by them. So frustrating.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Do not buy these
content: These masks are not packaged properly. The ends were crumbled up and folded. Also, they stink! I’m not putting anything on my face that smells like this. You get a lot of masks for a good price, but what’s the purpose if they are crumbled up and stink.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Had a severe allergic reaction from these
content: Wore these on a 6 hour flight. The next morning my lips started to blister. They got extremely swollen and were itchy. This went on for a week before I went to urgent care. The doctor said I was having an allergic reaction to the masks I had been wearing. I would not recommend these.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Horrible masks! Do not buy!!!
content: Does not stretch nor stay up over your nose. It’s hard to describe but they’re not soft and accommodating. I had to throw the entire box away. No one in my family were able to use these! A complete waste of money!

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Black surgical facial mask

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Smell

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Kinda itchy
content: I like that they are black they fit nice but kind of itchy, We'll keep in the car as backup

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Great fit for the price. I would buy again.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Love these!
content: These masks are so comfortable and fit my outfits so nicely. They are easy to breathe in, and look so much better than the blue to me.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Falls apart after a few hours

I thought it was just a fluke the first time, but since none have survived I think it’s an overall quality issue

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: These masks don't feel like they were designed for faces
content: The mask quality is okay, but the dimensions of the mask just don't feel very comfortable on my face. I'm not sure if it's just me, but it just doesn't feel like it was designed ergonomically. Apart from that, I didn't see much wrong with them.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Why am I receiving an OPEN item????
content: I open the Amazon bag and the bag the masks are in is wide open. I was reading the reviews and it seems like they are coming as in opened or used?! This is so unsanitary and annoying. Will be returning.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Quality changed
content: I ordered these first back in September and really liked the quality. They were sturdy and the wire for the nose was snug. I ordered them again recently and they are not the same quality. They came in different packaging and are flimsy and don’t stay snug on the nose. Bummer!

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask

content: These are itchy, break easily, and the nose piece is a joke. I do not recommend these masks at all.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask

content: We all have reusable masks, but sometimes you need to grab a go to. These are everyone’s favorite.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask

Like you may get a run of 5 that are fine, then, you get 12 in a row that do not have the wire nose bridge.  Spend your money elsewhere.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Not a stand alone mask - very thin
content: First, the masks came in a vacuum sealed plastic packaging.  That was a surprise for me.  And they are THIN ... thinner than thin.  I thought - no way can these be 3 ply.  So I ripped one apart.  It was 3 ply. The inner and outer layers were a black meshy material while the inside was a piece that could be considered a filter---ish.  So I did the blow test.  I lit a lighter and with this mask on, was able to easily blow the flame out.  So it is very useless alone.That being said, I did not buy them to wear alone.  I bought them to wear underneath my cloth mask for added protection.  So, I put the mask under my homemade cloth mask, did the fire test, and I was unable to blow the flame out.Long story short ... I'm on the fence as to whether to keep them.  I never intended to wear them alone.  So I have to think on it.  When I see reviews of other black masks, they all seem to the same - super thin.  I doubt I would buy any more from a place where I cannot touch them first.  If I can't find any that are better, I may keep these.  I got 3 packages of 50 each for a total of 150 masks for $16 and change.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Ear loops broken, not attached to at least 20 of first 25+ I tried to use.
content: I have no idea how these have so many positive reviews…as notes ear loops missing, connected on only one end or pulled out when  trying to apply.For  those that I was able to use, about 6 …I felt ear loops very uncomfortable , pulled on ears..I am a woman with a small, thinnish face.But to have refund, I am required to return..or accept another order of the same defective masks.They will go into recycle . Surprised Amazon carries defective masks and has unusually unreasonable return .

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Absolutely love these

Also I love the fact that they’re black and that they match most of my clothes much better than that bright white and blue that shows every speck of dirt or makeup! Oh and let’s not forget the price! Such an awesome deal at an affordable price!

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask

It fits well, but that chemical smell and residue made me suffer for half the day at work.Coming from a mfg. background it's definitely from the plastic casing and mask material/processing.  Of course I returned this ASAP and be careful of using this company.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: They smell and feel terrible
content: As I sat in my car, preparing for a long shift, I opened my bag of masks with the exact amount of joy one feels in this moment.  As I brought the black mask to my face, I noticed that scent. An aroma that my nose did not enjoy one bit. I soldiered through, hoping that it wasn't as bad as I thought.But the discomfort, the nauseating smell- it was too much. I used a mask that work provided me as this one sat alone in my car for eight long hours.Cue day two. Perhaps the smell had dissipated. It had been twenty-four hours after all. The smell had stayed, more stubborn than cat hair on a black sweater. I was prepared though. As I attached it to my face, the poor quality became even more apparent.The loops were cheap, the space between my face and the mask vast.  The metal nose piece stubbornly remained near its original shape.I threw the mask on the seat and brought out some leftover masks that had been misplaced months ago. Things didn't work out. Another work-provided mask had to do.A long twenty seconds was spent deciding that these were to be returned. I truly hope they can be returned.Please, if you have a nose and/or have skin of any sort, don't purchase these.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Lightweight Protective Disposable Masks
content: Very comfortable and not too tight around my ears.  There's a slight coating which provides extra protection.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Get them. A fashionable and sanitary option.
content: Thankful I switched to this disposable option.These look good, they feel good, they're impressive to people who don't wear disposable masks. They rock. These are modern, lightweight, and look great with any outfit. The inner part is a dull black, the exterior has a small shine to it. The nose wire is adjustable and can be fitted to your nose shape without chafing. The ear loops are stretchy but comfortable and don't cut off circulation to your ears or make you look like Dumbo. After a few days of use, the inner part of the mask gets a little tattered - but that's normal, and doesn't bother me as I would only use one of these a day before tossing it. I've never had an issue with how these masks smell, but I understood when I bought these masks that they are made of a certain material and had kind of prepped myself for that. Still, no overly chemical smell in these masks, at least for me and the batch I received.I was wearing fabric masks that were reusable at the beginning of the pandemic, but like many, I would switch between 3 or 4 masks and wash them every once in a while. A few months after the pandemic began I noticed I was getting acne around my cheeks and chin, and pretty much any area where the masks rubbed against my skin. I'm not prone to pimples so I figured it was an infamous case of "maskne" that a ton of folks were struggling with.Switching to disposable masks stopped all that for me.If you wear makeup, you should be getting these (or any other disposable option for that matter). If you don't wear makeup, you should be getting these. Imagine the saliva that gets trapped in the mask when you speak with it on, then imagine wearing that saliva for several days on your face before you toss it in the laundry. At the very least these can be a "in case my current mask stinks" or a "leave in the car for emergencies" option. If you're thinking about getting these, get these. They're cool.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Best Disposable Masks You Can Buy
content: These masks are fantastic. They are super light and allow for breathing while protecting myself and others from pollutants and germs. I have spent hundreds of dollars over the past two years in search of a mask that met my comfort needs and still allowed me to sound clear when I speak, and these were the winner. And the cost was great, too! My kids don’t argue about wearing these masks and my friend who works in health care is constantly stealing my masks because they are better than the ones in her clinic. Thats amazing, right there!

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Comfortable and Sleek
content: Comfortable, sleek and they match the bulk of my wardrobe! So far I haven't had any issues with them breaking or hurting my ears. I like that they are a little more stuff than blue/white masks while still conforming to my face and staying in place. Want something that's a little more fashionable without being to flashy? Try these bad boys.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Well-fitting and sharp-looking.
content: These seem to be a bit more "willing" to conform to face contours, making for better fit and less leakage upward into eyes when exhaling.  Very soft and comfortable, and appear to be on the top end of the effectiveness scale for simple respiratory coverings.  After a little stewing over "tough guy" appearance, I finally concluded that they're the most business-like and best appearing in any setting, and appear to be more effective.  No regrets.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Straps rip easily
content: More than half of these came with only a small piece of wire or no wire at all. About 10 of them came with a complete wire out of 100. They rip very easily. The straps come apart even easier. One small move and the strap tears. Most of them had no wire or half a wire so it was loose and falling off our faces. For a little more get something better. These were basily all trash.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Well fitting and more effective than cloth
content: These look a lot like cloth masks but since they are disposable they are more effective according to a Pentagon study. We have used many of the white/light blue masks but I think these look better. The elastic bands are long enough for adults and fit well. Some of the other masks we tried were too tight and the bands would cause my ears to hurt. These are more comfortable for long use. It is also nice to throw them away after several uses and easy to keep spares in the cars so we always have masks available.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Smelled like dead body
content: The price was excellent and of course, we need masks due to COVID, but they smelled so badly I had to send them back.  The smell was so strong even after airing out a few days  so I had to request a refund.  They appeared to be good masks but I was afraid to actually wear them due to the smell.  The company was great. . . they refunded my money.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: A must have for protection.
content: I like  these mask,they  fit perfectly  fine around your  mouth and  nose.,they stretch over  your  ears not to tight. Able to cover both nose and  mouth also  a metal strip across the  top of the  nose. Better than the  blue  ones,3 layers of protection . This is  my second  order. Use them every time I go some  where.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Look and work great!
content: My daughter is in middle school and begged to have black masks for school. I got this pack and they work great! They are nice looking, breathable and fit great! She has a very thin face and it fits her great. It also fits my younger kids and me. Very happy with this purchase!

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Decent

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Great value!

I've had to go into a medical setting a lot lately and thought it would be good to double up with a disposable. The fit nicely and the nose piece adjusts. Overall, these work great! The did have a bit of a chemical-y smell when they first arrived but it dissipated. The black is a lot more attractive than the blue/white ones in my opinion.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Very bad quality

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask
title: Gets sweaty and gross easily, hard to breathe
content: I ran out of the generic blue surgical masks so I bought these black ones instead. 1) the material is very different, making it hard to breathe after wearing for a prolonged period, maybe 2hours+ 2) it gets really moist and gross under the mask due to breathing or sweating, making your make up rubs off super quickly, and very uncomfortable 3) the mask slides around so you have to adjust it constantly. it's either my chin or my nose that's always exposed so I have to fix my mask every now and then. overall, I would not recommend these. although they look cool, they do not get the job done.

product: 100Pcs Disposable Face Masks, Black Face Mask, 3 Ply Disposable Mask

title: Perfect for airport
